Package units

Class Unit

java.lang.Object
units.Unit
Direct Known Subclasses:
Archer, FootSoldier, Settler
public abstract class Unit
extends Object
Base class for all units in the game. Each unit has a position, belongs to a nation, and has a type. All units have a method to move, attack, and defend.
Author:
Adi, Joesph, Shane, Dillion

  • Constructor Details

    • Unit

      public Unit​(int x, int y, Nation nation, double attackPoints, double defensePoints, int movesPerTurn, int attackRange, javafx.scene.image.Image sprite)
      Constructor for a unit Should only be called by subclasses. Takes in a position, nation and some stats for the unit.
      Parameters:
      x - The column index
      y - The row index
      nation - Name of the nation the unit belongs to
      attackPoints - How many attack points each unit does per turn
      defensePoints - How much defense each unit has
      movesPerTurn - How many tiles each unit can move per turn
      attackRange - The number of tiles a unit can attack within
      sprite - The sprite for this unit
